title: Doctor Wear
summary: Doctor Wear is a countdown to the next Doctor Who episode, on your Android Wear.
description: Are you a Doctor Who fan with an Android Wear on your wrist?This app is for you!Doctor Wear is a countdown to the next Doctor Who episode on BBC.Having an Android Wear watch is a plus but not mandatory: the countdown also works on Android phones and tablets.Mobile features:- countdown to the next DW episode on BBC (UK, US [new!])- vibration with TARDIS animation when countdown completes- season 10 episodes list & links to BBC websites [new!]- countdown Widget [new!]Android Wear features:- countdown in standalone card or fullscreen- vibration with TARDIS animation when countdown completes--Android Wear Device Frame created by Cyril Mottier (cyrilmottier.com), licensed under the CC BY 3.0 (creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/).DISCLAIMER - This App is unofficial and is not affiliated with Doctor Who in any way. descriptionHTML:
Are you a Doctor Who fan with an Android Wear on your wrist?
This app is for you!

Doctor Wear is a countdown to the next Doctor Who episode on BBC.

Having an Android Wear watch is a plus but not mandatory: the countdown also works on Android phones and tablets.

Mobile features:
- countdown to the next DW episode on BBC (UK, US [new!])
- vibration with TARDIS animation when countdown completes
- season 10 episodes list & links to BBC websites [new!]
- countdown Widget [new!]

Android Wear features:
- countdown in standalone card or fullscreen
- vibration with TARDIS animation when countdown completes

--
Android Wear Device Frame created by Cyril Mottier (cyrilmottier.com), licensed under the CC BY 3.0 (creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/).

DISCLAIMER - This App is unofficial and is not affiliated with Doctor Who in any way. All content copyright their respective owners. No infringement implied.
